title: Build Spring Applications with Spring Data and NoSQL
description:
Want to improve your Java skills and boost productivity with modern tools? Get it all in our 3-in-1 free hands-on workshop, where we develop and launch an application using popular Spring components Boot and Data, while storing customer data in a powerful distributed NoSQL database Apache Cassandra! 

Modern tools give you an opportunity to work faster and build more efficient apps, keeping business clients happy. Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity to upgrade your software Development competencies!

Session Details:
